    • 方法详细资料

      • incrementWindowSize

        protected void incrementWindowSize(int windowSizeIncrement)
                            throws Http2Exception
        Increment window size.
        参数:
        windowSizeIncrement - The amount of the incrementation
        抛出:
        Http2Exception - If the window size is now higher than the maximum allowed

      • doNotifyAll

        @Deprecated
protected void doNotifyAll()
        已过时。 

      • emitHeader

        public final void emitHeader(String name,
                             String value)
                      throws HpackException
        Pass a single header to the recipient.
        参数:
        name - Header name
        value - Header value
        抛出:
        HpackException - If a header is received that is not compliant with the HTTP/2 specification

      • setHeaderException

        public void setHeaderException(StreamException streamException)
        Inform the recipient of the headers that a stream error needs to be triggered using the given message when validateHeaders() is called. This is used when the Parser becomes aware of an error that is not visible to the recipient.
        参数:
        streamException - The exception to use when resetting the stream

      • validateHeaders

        public void validateHeaders()
                     throws StreamException
        Are the headers pass to the recipient so far valid? The decoder needs to process all the headers to maintain state even if there is a problem. In addition, it is easy for the the intended recipient to track if the complete set of headers is valid since to do that state needs to be maintained between the parsing of the initial headers and the parsing of any trailer headers. The recipient is the best place to maintain that state.
        抛出:
        StreamException - If the headers received to date are not valid
